body:
360487 - @L0lic0nwizard same reason why some people read JP/CN doujins, despite not speaking the language; it’s just that hot.

Also, mommy’s bonkers.

Why would you comment in Spanish under a hentai that's in English if you can read English you can comment in English why even comment if nobody can understand what your saying, like i wouldn't leave a comment here in Russian there wouldn't be any point but I always see people spouting nonsense in Spanish 🤦
Si está leyendo este comentario, sus padres morirán dentro de 5 años. Para deshacer esta maldición, debes copiarlo y pegarlo en otros 5 manga.
